description: yellow and brown pagoda slightly left of center, partially covered by yellow and green abstracted trees; green tree forms behind; matted and framed
markings: \'[two untranslated characters] 29150 Okiie Hashimoto 1958\', in pencil, at LR corner below image; character, in a red circle, at LR corner; untranslated inscription, in black, at right edge of image near LR corner
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Golden Pavillion Through Trees
